des:
Enjoy calmer day times and quicker bedtimes with Moshi.

Join the millions of parents who use Moshi to help their kids relax, unwind, and sleep with over 85 hours of original audio stories, sleep sounds, meditations, and relaxing music. Includes special guest stories and meditations narrated by legends of stage and screen, including Goldie Hawn and Patrick Stewart. Recommended by sleep experts and physicians.

Quicker Bedtimes:

Moshi helps kids of all ages fall asleep independently with over 400 pieces of soothing audio stories, sleep sounds, and meditations created by the BAFTA award-winning Moshi team.

- 97% of parents surveyed agree that Moshi helps get their kids to sleep quicker than usual.
- 95% said using the app makes bedtime less stressful*.
With Moshi, kids fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer, and wake up less. In a recent study*, scientists discovered that, on average:

- Kids fall asleep 28 minutes earlier
- Kids sleep for 22 minutes longer
- Night wakings decrease by up to 50%

Calmer Day Times:

Teach kids the basics of mindfulness with guided meditations and deep breathing exercises designed to help children relax, reduce anxiety, and manage negative thoughts.
Mindfulness topics to encourage positive emotions include:

- Kindness
- Gratitude
- Positive thinking
- Staying calm
- Patience
- Self-appreciation

Why Moshi Stories Work:

- Moshi Stories are gentle rhyming journeys with dreamy, lullaby-style choruses
- Music and ambient white noise are specifically designed to be relaxing
- As each story progresses, the narrator becomes increasingly sleepy and ambient sounds diminish.
Children, babies, and toddlers all love the adorable characters from the world of Moshi including:

- SleepyPaws the Snoozy Koala and his eucalyptus-fueled imagination
- Yawnsy the Sleepwalking Otter and his enchanted yawn
- Nodkins the Bedtime Bunny and her ability to hop into any dream

Features to support calmer day times and quicker bedtimes:

- Original sleepy stories and calming meditations released each week
- Bite-sized meditations and deep breathing exercises designed just for kids
- Soothing sleep sounds and white noise for babies, including pink, velvet, and classic white noise
- Explore curated playlists for specific situations like “Nap,” “Sleep,” and “Calm”


Subscriptions

Parents who sign up for the Moshi annual & monthly subscriptions unlock the full catalogue of Stories, Meditations, Music, White Noise and Sleep Sounds available for as long as they are subscribed.

To access premium content on Moshi via Alexa, parents should make sure to link their Moshi accounts to Alexa via the Alexa app by opening the Alexa app, finding the Moshi skill, selecting “Settings”, choosing “Link account”, and entering their Moshi login details. By linking your Moshi account to Alexa, you confirm that you are over the age of majority in your country of residence.

If you are not currently a Moshi Premium subscriber, go to our website to subscribe or download the Moshi app and upgrade to an Apple or Google subscription. Moshi subscriptions are intended for use by parents to assist children to relax and go to sleep. By creating an account and purchasing a Moshi Premium subscription, you confirm you are over the age of majority in your country of residence.

Non-subscribers can still access a selection of free tracks via the skill. 

If you experience any trouble please contact us or take a look at our FAQ 

*Poll of 600 users, Apr 2019
*30 children over 10 days, NYU Langone, August 2020
